languages.text: {n}Спустя полчаса ваше тело изувечено, а сознание содрогается при мысли о продолжении. Тем не менее, несмотря на издевательства ксеноса, вы стойко выдерживаете чудовищную боль, не проронив ни звука.{/n}

{n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя полчаса ваше тело изувечено, а сознание содрогается при мысли о продолжении. Тем не менее, несмотря на издевательства ксеноса, вы стойко выдерживаете чудовищную боль, не проронив ни звука.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After half an hour, your body is maimed and your mind shudders at the thought of this going on any longer. Nevertheless, in spite of Marazhai's mistreatment, you endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

{n}After half an hour, your body is maimed and your mind shudders at the thought of this going on any longer. Nevertheless, in spite of Marazhai's mistreatment, you endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

{n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

{n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

{n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

{n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au bout d'une demi-heure de torture, votre corps mutilé est couvert de sang. Votre esprit frémit en imaginant les souffrances qui vous attendent encore. Malgré tout, vous laissez Marazhai continuer son supplice en endurant la douleur insoutenable sans faire le moindre bruit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout d'une demi-heure de torture, votre corps mutilé est couvert de sang. Votre esprit frémit en imaginant les souffrances qui vous attendent encore. Malgré tout, vous laissez Marazhai continuer son supplice en endurant la douleur insoutenable sans faire le moindre bruit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras media hora de tortura, tu cuerpo queda ensangrentado y mutilado. Tu mente se estremece ante la perspectiva de seguir sufriendo. Aun así, guardas silencio ante el maltrato de Marazhai, y soportas el terrible dolor sin hacer ningún sonido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras media hora de tortura, tu cuerpo queda ensangrentado y mutilado. Tu mente se estremece ante la perspectiva de seguir sufriendo. Aun así, guardas silencio ante el maltrato de Marazhai, y soportas el terrible dolor sin hacer ningún sonido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}经过了长达半个小时的折磨，你浑身上下鲜血淋漓。一想到还要继续忍受这样的痛苦，你就不禁心惊胆战。不过，面对玛拉斋的施虐，你依然保持着沉默，默默忍受着难以言喻的痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}经过了长达半个小时的折磨，你浑身上下鲜血淋漓。一想到还要继续忍受这样的痛苦，你就不禁心惊胆战。不过，面对玛拉斋的施虐，你依然保持着沉默，默默忍受着难以言喻的痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}30分の拷問ののち、あなたの体は血まみれで、切り刻まれていた。これ以上の苦しみを想像すると心が震える。それにもかかわらず、あなたはマラズハイの虐待の前では沈黙を守り、物音を立てずに恐ろしい痛みに耐える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}1時間の拷問ののち、あなたの体は血まみれで、切り刻まれていた。これ以上の苦しみを想像すると心が震える。それにもかかわらず、あなたはマラズハイの虐待の前では沈黙を守り、物音を立てずに恐ろしい痛みに耐える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einer halben Stunde Folter ist dein Körper blutig und geschunden. Dein Verstand schaudert bei dem Gedanken an weiteres Leid. Dennoch bleibst du im Angesicht von Marazhais Misshandlungen stumm und erduldest die grauenhaften Schmerzen, ohne ein Geräusch von dir zu geben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer halben Stunde Folter ist dein Körper blutig und geschunden. Dein Verstand schaudert bei dem Gedanken an weiteres Leid. Dennoch bleibst du im Angesicht von Marazhais Misshandlungen stumm und erduldest die grauenhaften Schmerzen, ohne ein Geräusch von dir zu geben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yarım saatlik işkencenin ardından bedenin kan ve yaralarla kaplanıyor. Zihnin daha fazla acı çekme düşüncesine bile katlanamıyor. Yine de Marazhai'ın zalimce muamelesi karşısında sessizliğini koruyorsun ve bu korkunç acıya tek bir ses bile çıkarmadan katlanıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After half an hour of torture, your body is bloody and mutilated. Your mind shudders at the thought of any further suffering. Nevertheless, you remain silent in the face of Marazhai's mistreatment, and endure the horrible pain without making a sound.{/n}
